Room.Name: Hedged Pathway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a path in the enchanted forest, walking beside a high hedge.
Room.LongDescription: Although the path is very broad, the hedge is so thick you cannot step off the path. To the west there is a clearing where you can see towering redwood trees. To the east the path takes a turn, but the trees are more normal in size. You can smell the pleasant smoke of a wood fire on the breeze coming from the east.
